programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY heavyweight champion Rico Verhoeven returns in a non-title match-up against former Enfusion heavyweight champion Ismael Lazaar.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 45 Superfight Series: on September 30, 2017 at the Sporthallen Zuid in Amsterdam, Netherlands. This event features fights from Jason Wilnis, Yousri Belgaroui, Zouggary, Glunder, Beztati, Danenberg and Koprivlenski.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 45: on September 30, 2017 at the Sporthallen Zuid in Amsterdam, Netherlands. This event features a fight between Robin van Roosmalen and Serhiy Adamchuk for the Glory Featherweight Championship as Glory 45: Amsterdam headliner, and a Welterweight pairing between Nieky Holzken and Yoann Kongolo as co-headliner. This event also features a 4-Man Light Heavyweight Contender Tournament to earn a shot at the Glory Light Heavyweight Championship. An injury suffered during training has forced former welterweight champion Nieky Holzken out of the bout against Alim Nabiev.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Rico Verhoeven takes on Antonio 'Bigfoot' Silva in the main event of the GLORY 46 Superfight Series.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Alex Pereira takes on Simon Marcus for the GLORY middleweight championship in the main event at GLORY 46 China.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: New Middleweight Champion Alex Pereira puts his title on the line against Yousri Belgaroui. Also, former champion Nieky Holzken returns to face Alim Nabiyev and Dâ€™Angelo Marshall meets Ismael Londt in a heavyweight showdown.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Lightweight contender tournament semifinals and finals are featured for GLORY 49, Rotterdam

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY Heavyweight Champion Rico Verhoeven puts his title on the line against Jamal Ben Saddik. Michael Duut and Danyo Ilunga meet in a rematch and Petchpanomrung takes on Zakaria Zouggary.
